alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:34AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harrison, east central Meade, southwestern Jefferson, north central Hardin and west central Bullitt Counties through 800 AM EST... At 734 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brandenburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valley Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
